org.dotplot.image.ui
Class ConfigQImageView

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.dotplot.ui.ConfigurationView
          org.dotplot.image.ui.ConfigQImageView

public class ConfigQImageView
extends ConfigurationView

With the ConfigQImageView the user can configure the dotplot settings. It seperates the configuration in Image Settings and Export Settings
